appDesc.description: Fotor Photo Editor is a free online designer and editing tool catering to all your photographic and image creation needs! Add filters, frames, text, stickers and effects; create a photo collage, retouch portrait, card, design graphics with Fotor free online photo editor. The newly onlined Design feature offers as much as 19 preset design template types, including Facebook cover, Twitter cover, YouTube Channel art, Instagram post, cards, posters etc. There are all together thousands of professionally designed templates under each catagory. Graphic design has never been so easy and fun!
appDesc.message: Chosen by over 200 million, the Fotor online photo editor and designer is easy yet powerful! Dubbed by BBC as the lite Photoshop!
